Name: Falling Leaf Aesi

Interrupts.Name: Steal Ability
Interrupts.Trigger: A foe in range 2 uses an ability and the ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effects: The foe loses the memory of that ability, becoming unable to use it until they pick up a memory. If the ability is a stance or aura, it has no effect for the duration.

Actions.Name: Leaf Dance
Actions.Effects: Aesi may dash up to 5 spaces during any part of this attack, making attacks against any adjacent foes during its movement, but must move in a straight line. During this movement, they can shove any memories 1 to either side.

Actions.Name: Whirling Leaves
Actions.Description: Repeat the following effect three times.
Actions.Effects: Teleport 1, then deal 2 damage to all adjacent foes and shove all adjacent foes and memories.

Actions.Name: Greenpath
Actions.Description: Remove the Aesi from play, then place them anywhere on the battlefield in free space. Clear all statuses, marks and blights from them.

Actions.Name: Fae Thief
Actions.Description: The Aesi steals something from a foe in range 5. Roll 1d6 to see what. Picking up a memory removes an effect of the foe's choice. Re-roll repeat effects.

Rolls.Name: Friendship
Rolls.Description: Foe's abilities can't target allies and treat all allies as immune to their effects, including any active marks, stances, auras, etc.

Rolls.Name: Luck
Rolls.Description: Foe cannot gain boons or critically hit.

Rolls.Name: Heart
Rolls.Description: Foe cannot gain vigor or benefit from defiance.

Rolls.Name: Talent
Rolls.Description: Foe takes +1 curse on all attacks and saves.

Rolls.Name: Youth
Rolls.Description: Foe cannot dash and is slowed+.

Actions.Name: Wall of Thorns
Actions.Description: The Aesi creates a line 4 area of height 2 thorny wall objects. Each object is destructible (10 hp) and also considered dangerous terrain. Character that collide with it take 2 divine damage.

PhasesDescription: On round 4, and every two rounds thereafter (6, 8, 10 etc), the Aesi uses Mortal Mockery.
